name: koha-snippets
description: code to be pasted into Koha's admin side

scripts.build: npm run admin-js; npm run admin-scss; npm run catalog-js; npm run catalog-scss
scripts.ajs: npm run admin-js; cat dist/IntranetUserJS.js | pbcopy; open 'https://library-staff.cca.edu/cgi-bin/koha/admin/preferences.pl?op=search&searchfield=IntranetUserJS'
scripts.acss: npm run admin-scss; cat dist/IntranetUserCSS.css | pbcopy; open 'https://library-staff.cca.edu/cgi-bin/koha/admin/preferences.pl?op=search&searchfield=IntranetUserCSS'
scripts.cjs: npm run catalog-js; cat dist/OPACUserJS.js | pbcopy; open 'https://library-staff.cca.edu/cgi-bin/koha/admin/preferences.pl?op=search&searchfield=OPACUserJS'
scripts.ccss: npm run catalog-scss; cat dist/OPACUserCSS.css | pbcopy; open 'https://library-staff.cca.edu/cgi-bin/koha/admin/preferences.pl?op=search&searchfield=OPACUserCSS'
scripts.admin-js: uglifyjs admin-js/*.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 > dist/IntranetUserJS.js --preamble "// minified $(date), see https://github.com/cca/koha_snippets"
scripts.catalog-js: uglifyjs catalog-js/*.js --comments --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 > dist/OPACUserJS.js --preamble "// minified $(date), see https://github.com/cca/koha_snippets"
scripts.test: jshint admin-js/*.js; jshint catalog-js/*.js; scss-lint admin-scss/*.scss; scss-lint catalog-scss/*.scss;
